page.title: 19Aire Valley Trunk Road
page.content:
It has been proposed for a long time to build a road through the Aire Valley to take traffic off the A629 trunk road. Alternative plans were made several years ago and an Inquiry held. Now builders are getting ready to start construction. Some people argue as to whether it is needed. We did a survey of the present traffic.
COMMERCIAL VEHICLES - 250 per hour CARS - 820 per hour BUSES - 12 per hour
The proposed route will cause some people to be rehoused. Naturally the occupiers are not keen.It will also go straight through Marley playing fields used a lot by local schools and clubs There has been much local argument over the issues involved but it now seems the new road will go ahead.
